name: Captain Geoffrey's Estate Walk, Dudmaston Estate

ai.summary: A scenic 14.1 km hike through the Dudmaston Estate on Captain Geoffrey's Estate Walk, revealing estate landscapes, woodlands and tranquil countryside along a historic route in the UK.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed surfaces including estate roads, grassy tracks and woodland trails. Expect uneven ground in woodland sections and occasional gentle climbs.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for UK weather and estate opening times. Stay on marked paths; wear sturdy boots and bring waterproof layers. Carry enough water and snacks, a map or GPS, and a phone. Be mindful of uneven surfaces, ticks in woodland, and livestock on some stretches; follow any posted guidance and have a means to call for help if needed.
recommended_gear: Layered clothing and a waterproof jacket
Map, compass or GPS device (and offline map)
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn (roughly March to October); late spring and early autumn often offer the best balance of daylight and mild conditions.

seo.title: Captain Geoffrey's Estate Walk – Dudmaston Estate, UK | 14.1 km Moderate Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore Captain Geoffrey's Estate Walk, a 14.1 km moderate hike through the Dudmaston Estate in Shropshire, England. Scenic woodlands, open parkland and historic grounds with practical safety and gear tips.
